item.title: Re: Please Can someone Please help me? i'll REward You!
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

When u click edit do you see something that looks like this[code=]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
item.source: Re: Please Can someone Please help me? i'll REward You!
